attributes.action: Give them grant to survive coronavirus period
attributes.additional_details: Give them grants and help them get loans.
attributes.background: Help small business survive during the coronavirus period.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a range of financial support for small businesses, including grants and loans: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/guidance-to-employers-and-businesses-about-covid-19/covid-19-support-for-businesses

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
